text: Edo CastleTokyo used to be called Edo. is a castle built on a flatland in the year 1457. It was built by Ōta Dōkan. It is part of the Tokyo Imperial Palace in Chiyoda, Tokyo. It was restored by Tokugawa leyasu. It was destroyed by fire many times. == Notes == == Sources == Category:Castles in Japan Category:Buildings and structures in Tokyo Category:15th-century buildings and structures
title: Edo Castle
